short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Cybersecurity email reports for business and personal emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automated user awareness to prevent users from engaging phishing attacks.

Capabilities

- Detect Suspicious Requests in Real-Time 
- Gain Insights with Behavioral Email Analysis
- Identify Malicious Attachments and Links Instantly
- Identify Phishing Attempts with Language Detection
- Spot and Prevent Phishing with Error Detection
- Verify Email Authenticity Effortlessly

Benefits

- Enhance user awareness and preparedness, reducing the likelihood of falling for phishing schemes.
- Ensure that emails are from trusted sources, reducing the risk of phishing and spoofing attacks.
- Improve the ability to identify and block phishing attempts by analyzing the language and tone of emails.
- Offer a deeper understanding of email behaviors, aiding in the detection of phishing and other malicious activities.
- Reduce the risk of falling victim to phishing scams by flagging potentially fraudulent requests.
- Users may quickly identify and avoid phishing emails by highlighting suspicious errors.
